US Stock Insights

Privacy Policy

Introduction

Investment Analytics GmbH, the "Publisher" of US Stock Insights ("the App") in Microsoft's AppSource, is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy outlines how we handle your personal information in relation to your use of our investment analytics services provided through the Microsoft AppSource platform. By using the App, you agree to the practices described in this policy.

Information Collection and Use

1. Personal Information: The App itself does not collect, store, or use any personal information from its users. Our primary function is to display desired analytics of selected companies based on the data you choose to analyze within Microsoft Power BI. We do not have access to or manage any personal data you may input or process through Power BI.

However, to purchase and access the App via Microsoft AppSource, you must provide certain information to Microsoft, including:

  • Name
  • Email address
  • Payment information
  • Other contact information

This information is collected and managed by Microsoft and is subject to their privacy policies.

2. Usage Data: While the App itself does not collect any personal data, please be aware that Microsoft may collect certain information related to your use of the App through their Power BI services. This data collection is governed by Microsoft’s privacy policies and includes information such as usage patterns, device information, and performance metrics.

Microsoft Data Collection

When you use the App through Microsoft Power BI, Microsoft may collect the following types of information:

  • Usage Information: Data about how you interact with Power BI and the App, including features used, actions taken, and time spent on the App.
  • Device Information: Information about the devices you use to access the App, including hardware and software details, device identifiers, and network information.
  • Performance Data: Metrics related to the performance and stability of the App, which help Microsoft improve their services.

For detailed information on Microsoft’s data collection and privacy practices, please refer to the Microsoft Privacy Statement.

Security

We are committed to ensuring that your information is secure. Although the App does not collect personal data, we adhere to industry-standard security measures to protect the analytics and data processed through Power BI.

Third-Party Links

The App may contain links to third-party Dashboards or services that are not operated by us. If you click on a third-party link, you will be directed to that third party’s site. We strongly advise you to review the Privacy Policy of every site you visit. We have no control over and assume no responsibility for the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party sites or services.

Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the effective date. You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

By using Investment Insights on US Stocks, you acknowledge that you have read and understood this Privacy Policy and agree to its terms and conditions.
